channel.title: Jamjar Sessions - Deep House Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Jamjar Sessions
channel.description: A regular monthly mix of Deep House from London and Amsterdam with regular guest mixes. Jamjar Session - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep!
channel.itunes:summary: A regular monthly mix of Deep House from London and Amsterdam with regular guest mixes. Jamjar Session - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep!
channel.itunes:keywords: Deep House, Tech House, London, Amsterdam, Minimal, DJ Mix, Lounge, Jamjar

item.title: Jamjar Session 010
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Otto and Adam
item.description: Jamjar Session 010. The Final Mix - It’s been a while but then so has the last time Adam and Otto played a Jamjar set. In April 2009 we once again joined the Deep Rooted crew at Anam Bar in Islington, London for what was to be our last set together as Jamjar Sessions. Lucky for you, we had the good foresight to record the set. So here then is Jamjar Session 010 The Final Mix, recorded live!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Otto and Adam for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep
item.itunes:summary: Jamjar Session 010. The Final Mix - It’s been a while but then so has the last time Adam and Otto played a Jamjar set. item.itunes:keywords: Lounge, Chill House, Deep House, Tech House, Minimal, Electro, Soulful

item.title: Jamjar Session 009
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Otto
item.description: Jamjar Session 009. It's been a long wait, but the wait is finally over, Session 009 is here! This Jazz inspired warm-up set gets things going at a gentle 106 BPM and peaks at a toe-tapping, jazz hands in the air, 123 BPM. Inspired by my discovery of Wouda, who seamlessly introduces traditional jazz elements into his productions, this mix features three of his tracks! (highly unusual for Otto). The rest of the mix is littered with jazz elements. Look out for some classic St Germain too!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Otto for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep

item.title: Jamjar Session 008
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Adam
item.description: Jamjar Session 008. Holy priceless collection of Etruscan snoods! Adam, the other half of the dynamic duo known as Jamjar has delivered a session! Yes boys and girls Session 008 is here! Not since December 2006 has Adam delivered a set.... a set of such digital dirtyness, such soulful sexy houseness, such decedent deepness that we are sure you will all forgive him for having taking this long to deliver, and deliver he does! Get it here right now!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Adam for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep

item.title: Jamjar Session 007
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Otto
item.description: Jamjar Session 007. Back from the laid-back trip that was session 006, Otto has completed his move to London and brings you Session 007, a blend of deep dark beats and progressive tweaks. Uplifting and toe-tapping, this is no lounge lizard affair!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Otto for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep
item.itunes:summary: Jamjar Session 007. Back from the laid-back trip that was session 006, Otto has completed his move to London and brings you Session 007, a blend of deep dark beats and progressive tweaks. Uplifting and toe-tapping, this is no lounge lizard affair!
item.itunes:keywords: Deep House, Tech House, Minimal, Electro, Soulful

item.title: Jamjar Session - Special Guest - Tribal Soul
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Tribal Soul
item.description: For your aural pleasure here is our second mix in a month and our second guest set on Jamjar Sessions, compliments of Tribal Soul in Johannesburg, South Africa. The mix is a tribute to Deep House sensation Joey Youngman who recently graced South Africa with his skills behind the ones and twos. Enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Tribal Soul for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep
item.itunes:summary: For your aural pleasure here is our second mix in a month and our second guest set on Jamjar Sessions, compliments of Tribal Soul in Johannesburg, South Africa. item.itunes:keywords: Deep House, House, Tribal, Minimal, Electro, Soulful

item.title: Jamjar Session 006
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Otto
item.description: Jamjar Session 006. For those lazy sunny days ahead, Otto delivers his lounge warm-up for Summer 2007! An eclectic mix of down to mid tempo beats with lot of trip hop, breaks, nu-jazz and grooves.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Otto for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep
item.itunes:summary: Jamjar Session 006. For those lazy sunny days ahead, Otto delivers his lounge warm-up for Summer 2007! An eclectic mix of down to mid tempo beats with lot of trip hop, breaks, nu-jazz and grooves.
item.itunes:keywords: Lounge, Down Tempo, Deep House, Minimal, Electro, Soulful

item.title: Jamjar Session 005
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Otto
item.description: Jamjar Session 005. This one may be less dark but it is no less dirty. A mix of tech sounds and some soulful grooves all smothered in lovely deepness. This mix is dedicated to Otto's first visit back to South Africa since relocating last year to the marshes below sea level.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Otto for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep

item.itunes:keywords: Deep House, Tech House, Minimal, Electro, Soulful

item.title: Jamjar Session - Special Guest - Brett Jackson
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Brett Jackson
item.description: At just 24 South African Brett Jackson has 4 CD albums, several studio releases and various national and international tours to his name. His unique style of deep, seductive, soulful house music combined with flawless mixing and impeccable track selection makes him a highly sought-after artist of proven international calibre. Enjoy our first guest set, served up with style by Brett Jackson...
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Brett Jackson for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep

item.itunes:keywords: Deep House, Tech House, Minimal, Electro, Soulful

item.title: Jamjar Session 003
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Otto
item.description: Jamjar Session 003, another fine mix from Otto. A new year and a new label! This mix was created as an introduction to WOT! Recordings, an exciting new South African Deep House label launched by our good friend Brett Jackson. The mix serves up no less then four tracks from his label. This set is deep and it's soulful, sometimes dirty and even has a splash of tech house! Welcome the the New Year!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Otto for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep

item.itunes:keywords: Deep House, Tech House, Minimal, Electro, Soulful

item.title: Jamjar Session 002
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Adam
item.description: Welcome to the second Jamjar session, mixed by Adam. Continuing a slightly darker theme, Session 002 includes classic and electro elements with a good balance of four to the floor and bit of break beats. A pure digital mix with some subtle effects, Adam has delivered a set that includes classic Deep House sounds as well as some interesting Tech bits. Enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Adam for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep

item.itunes:keywords: Deep House, Tech House, Minimal, Electro

item.title: Jamjar Session 001
item.itunes:author: Mixed by Otto
item.description: Our first Jamjar Session is mixed by Otto. As our resident warm-up junky, Otto usually delivers mid tempo deep house or downtempo lounge sets. This time round, however, he delivers a very tech, almost progressive set, yet always remains deep. With rich padded synths, steady progression and flawless mixing, those who know Otto’s sound may be surprised by his latest offering. Enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed by Otto for jamjarsession.net - sometimes soulful, sometimes dirty, always deep
